name: CBConnectionEventMatchingOption
desc: A set of options to use when registering for connection events.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a matching option from the provided raw value.

items.name: static let peripheralUUIDs: CBConnectionEventMatchingOption
items.desc: An array of UUID objects that represents peripherals to match.

items.name: static let serviceUUIDs: CBConnectionEventMatchingOption
items.desc: An array that represents service identifiers to match.
